page.title: 03Lt. Kingshill School(cont.)
page.content: The school keeps quite a lot of animals;these include rabbits, guinea-pigs, gerbils,hamsters,a ferret and a Thai water-dragon called Georgina. There are several bantams with five recently hatched chicks,five ducks and many fish in the pond. In the aviary there are doves,quails, finches and budgerigars. Many lunch-time and after school clubs are held. These include drama, choir,football, cricket,athletics, netball,rounders,country dancing,gym., computers,tapestry,smocking,chess and Christian Union. The children often go on outings in connection with their work. These are mostly day trips, but the top year usually go away for a week.In the last few years they have been to Kent, Derbyshire,and France. Each year a party goes skiing,and to a P.G.L.camp.
